ComicInfo.Summary:
Probe investigates the mysterious destruction of an American satellite. However both the CIA and Sharpe want him off the case.
Space Miners get surprised when they try to mine a promising asteroid.
When the biker gangs of Mega City put on the Mega City 5000 Race to determine their leader, Judges try unsuccessfully to stop them.
